title: Oil extends gains as hopes of stimulus, OPEC cuts offset virus
text: Oil prices rose for a second day on Tuesday on expectations that central banks are likely to enact financial stimulus to offset the impacts of the coronavirus outbreak and growing optimism that OPEC will order deeper output cuts this week.

text: We think that what investors do now depends a lot on their starting point.
